Comments_List: Knowledge of basic concepts in functional harmony, transformation theory, and rhythm.

This course does a great job expanding on the material from Music 210. I especially liked the section about meter, and enjoyed being able to write about it in a paper. Liam's discussion of harmonies was also excellent, as he found a way to discuss complex ideas without leaving students confused.
I thought that there was quite a lot of practice throughout the course, which was effective, but I felt like the way in which some concepts were explained was not very effective.
It was definitely worth it for me to take this course after taking 210, since I learned a lot more about music theory than what 210 covered. I feel like I have a much better understanding of music.
